Message:
On that day, I could only
see you as a princess,
declining to step out of
the shadows and walk
by your side...

But...by your side was
where I truly wanted to be.
“My princess—no...
Lady Kaguya!!”

The Princess slowly
opens her eyes.
Then, reaches her hand
out to me as if
pleading for help.

“I’m sorry. On that day,
I ran away without noticing
how you truly felt...
but...”

“I shall live by your side
simply as Asahi!

So, please come back to me...
LADY KAGUYA!”

I saw the hand I was
unable to touch that day,
and grasped it with
all my might.

“...At last...
Thou hast called me by name.”

The fog that was concealing
her heart began to fade,

the darkness melted away
by golden hues of light.

But, the moment
we felt a sense of relief,
Lady Kaguya brushed
my hand away.

“As the one who willed
mine own country’s destruction,
I can no longer call myself
a princess... However...”

Lady Kaguya once again
offered her hand to me,
and spoke.

“As of now, I am but Kaguya.
If thou hast no qualms...
wilt thou live at my side...Asahi?”

The shadow in me whispered,
“That would be insolent of you,
lowly shadow.”

...But, I pushed that
shadow away, and smiled.

“Yes. From now, till forever.
I shall dedicate my life to you...
Lady Kaguya.”
